    Alle Klassen und Schnittstellen

    Klasse
    Beschreibung
    AnswerDAO_MariaDB
    MariaDB DAO (Data Access Object) for quiz answers.
    AnswerDAO_Serializable
    Serializable Data Access Object (DAO) representing a quiz answer for use with file-based serialization persistence.
    AnswerDTO
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a quiz answer.
    AnswerRowPanel
    Panel representing a single answer option row in the answer section.
    AnswersPanel
    Panel displaying all possible answers as individual answer rows.
    ConfigManager
    ConfigManager handles application configuration settings.
    DataAccessObject
    Interface defining the contract for quiz data persistence operations.
    DataManager
    Hybrid data manager that automatically falls back to file-based serialization when database connection is not available.
    DataManager.DataOperation<T>
     
    DataTransportObject
    Abstract base class for all Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) within the application logic layer.
    DBManager
    MariaDB-based implementation of the QuizDataInterface.
    GUIConstants
    Central GUI constants for the entire quiz application.
    LogicConstants
    Central constants for quiz logic and data management.
    MariaAccessObject
    Abstract base class for all MariaDB Data Access Objects (DAOs).
    MessagePanel
    Panel for displaying messages or notifications to the user at the bottom of the question view.
    MyButtonPanel
    Panel containing control buttons with integrated message display.
    QFrame
    Main application frame that contains the primary window and tabbed panels for the quiz application.
    QuestionButtonPanel
    Button panel for question management operations.
    QuestionDAO_MariaDB
    MariaDB DAO (Data Access Object) for quiz questions.
    QuestionDAO_Serializable
    Serializable DAO (Data Access Object) representing a quiz question for use with file-based serialization persistence.
    QuestionDTO
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a quiz question.
    QuestionListPanel
    Panel displaying a list of questions with theme filtering and persistent data integration.
    QuestionMetaPanel
    Panel for displaying a question's meta-information including the title and main question text.
    QuestionPanel
    Main panel for displaying a quiz question, including theme header, meta information, and answers.
    QuizButtonPanel
    Button panel for quiz controls in the quiz tab.
    QuizDataInterface
    Interface defining the contract for quiz data persistence operations.
    QuizDataManager
    Serialization-based implementation of QuizDataInterface.
    QuizHeaderPanel
    Separate header panel containing theme selection combo box and switch button.
    QuizHeaderPanel.ThemeSelectionListener
     
    QuizHeaderPanel.ViewSwitchListener
     
    QuizInfoViewPanel
    Panel showing quiz information.
    QuizInfoViewPanel.ThemeSelectionDelegate
    Interface for handling theme selection events.
    QuizMainPanel
    Main panel for the quiz tab providing quiz gameplay interface with session tracking and automatic fallback data storage support.
    QuizPanelDelegator
    Delegate interface for panel actions such as button clicks and list selections.
    QuizQuestionDelegator
    Delegate interface for actions performed on the question panel, such as deleting, saving, selecting questions, or creating new ones.
    QuizQuestionMainPanel
    Main panel for managing quiz questions.
    QuizSessionDTO
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a quiz session.
    QuizStatisticsMainPanel
    Main panel for displaying quiz statistics.
    QuizThemeDelegator
    Delegate interface for actions related to quiz themes, such as deleting, saving, or adding new themes.
    QuizThemeInfoView
    Panel showing theme information.
    QuizThemeMainPanel
    Main panel for managing quiz themes including selection and CRUD operations.
    QuizThemeMainPanel.ThemeChangeListener
    Listener interface for theme change events.
    SessionsTrendChart
    Compact trend chart showing success rates of recent quiz sessions.
    StatisticsBarChart
    Custom panel that displays a segmented bar chart for quiz statistics.
    TabPane
    Custom tabbed pane for the application UI.
    ThemeButtonPanel
    Button panel for theme operations with theme selection correction.
    ThemeDAO_MariaDB
    MariaDB Data Access Object (DAO) for quiz themes.
    ThemeDAO_Serializable
    Serializable Data Access Object (DAO) representing a quiz theme, used in the file-based serialization persistence implementation.
    ThemeDTO
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a quiz theme (category).
    ThemeHeaderPanel
    Panel for displaying the current theme of the active quiz question.
    ThemeListPanel
    Panel displaying a list of available themes with selection functionality.
    ThemeListPanel.ThemeSelectionListener
    Interface for theme selection events.
    ThemeManager
    ThemeManager handles the application's Look and Feel (theme) settings.
    ThemePanel
    Panel for creating and editing theme information.
    UserAnswerDTO
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a user's answer in a quiz session.
    UserStringConstants
    Central constants for all user-displayed strings in the quiz application.
    ValidationConstants
    Constants for data validation limits used throughout the DTO classes.
